snippet: Law firm Slater & Gordon Ltd said on Thursday it was preparing a class action lawsuit against Australian surfwear company Billabong International Ltd over alleged misleading conduct in information disclosure....

headline.print_headline: Australia's Billabong Faces Possible Class Action Lawsuit
headline.main: Australia's Billabong Faces Possible Class Action Lawsuit

lead_paragraph: Law firm Slater & Gordon Ltd said on Thursday it was preparing a class action lawsuit against Australian surfwear company Billabong International Ltd over alleged misleading conduct in information disclosure.
